articles.author: Rich Pelley
articles.title: ‘Fairytale of New York is so boring’: Liam Gallagher, Joe Lycett and more share their Christmas honest playlists - The Guardian
articles.description: We canvassed Olympic heroes, Love Island winners, Britpop stars, jazzers, unloved confectionery, Corrs and Christopher Biggins to find out how they feel about the festivities. But who dared to speak out against that Christmas classic?
articles.content:
Britpop icon
The song that best sums up my 2022Too Good for Giving Up by yours truly.
The song that gets me in the Christmas moodMerry Xmas Everybody by Slade and Fairytale of New York by the Pogue… [+16938 chars]

articles.author: Katie Sewell
articles.title: Princess Diana’s ‘iconic’ jewel with over five carats of diamonds could fetch £120,000 - Express
articles.description: One of the boldest jewels Princess Diana ever wore will soon be sold at auction, and experts estimate offers could exceed £120,000.

articles.author: Hana Carter
articles.title: ITV newsreader Chris Ship says 'arrogant pr***' live on air but for a very good reason - The Mirror
articles.description: Chris Ship intentionally used a swear word live on ITV news during a bulletin about New Zealand's prime minister Jacinda Ardern. The journalist said it's not a word that would normally be allowed to be broadcast before he went ahead and said it
articles.content:
ITV's news broadcaster Chris Ship raised eyebrows after using the phrase "arrogant p****" live on air.
The journalist warned viewers that he would be using the slur on national television, and that … [+2341 chars]
